description: We have partnered with a global company who manufactures products used exclusively in the acute care respiratory space. They are looking for a Hospital Sales Representative based in the greater Los Angeles area (does NOT include Orange County so you need to reside in LA County or Inland Empire). Selling on clinical impact and value is critical to your success. If you are looking to join a company whose needle is pointed up, has room for growth and is experiencing double digit growth, this may be the company for you.
responsibilities: Selling on clinical impact and value is critical to your success.

qualifications.required: 4 year degree required, Previous hospital sales experience required, Selling on clinical outcomes and value is key, Complex sales experience wanted, Previous experience working with distributor partners is a plus.

benefits: Medical insurance, 401(k), Vision insurance, Dental insurance
